name: Escalafy
one_liner: Escalafy is the financial brain of LATAM ecommerce, showing real profit, real ROAS, and real cashflow in real time.
main_value_prop: Unifies all sales and all real costs to show if a store is making or losing money today.
core_problem: Founders don't know their real profit because Meta over-attributes, Excel is manual, MP fees and cuotas destroy margins, and cashflow visibility is poor.

deep_context.why_it_exists: LATAM ecommerce founders sell well but lack financial clarity. ROAS looks high but profit is negative. MP fees, shipping, and cuotas destroy margins. Cashflow is unpredictable. Excel takes hours and contains errors. Decisions are made blind.
what_it_solves: Shows real profit including all costs
Displays true ROAS and blended ROAS
Reveals which products gain or lose money
Shows which campaigns silently destroy margin
Predicts cashflow based on payout schedules
Unifies Tiendanube, Shopify, ML, Ads and MP
deep_context.positioning: Escalafy is not a dashboard or a fancy spreadsheet. It is a real-time financial operator for LATAM ecommerce.
core_emotions: Stress from not knowing if the business is profitable
Desire for control, clarity and professionalization
